name: Falcon XDX
description:
How long can you survive this endless space shooter? Simple and intuitive controls make it easy to pick up and play for all ages. Tilt your device to steer the ship and tap the screen to fire. Have hours of fun dodging asteroids and shooting enemy attackers. Compete with your friends and the world via the game center high score table.

FEATURES:
• Game Center integration.
• Super smooth frame rate.
• Free to download.
• Good graphics.
• Free to play.
• Super Addicting.
• Multiple ships.
